## PlanResourcesMetadata.matchedScopes property

The [policy scopes](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/policies/scoped_policies)<!-- -->that were used to plan the query for each action.

**Signature:**

```typescript
matchedScopes: Record<string, string>;
```

## Remarks

Requires the Cerbos policy decision point server to be at least v0.44.
